Aromatherapy is saving me! Even in the sauna I need my lavender. It’s done wonders for my mood. Omg 110 degrees for 20 minutes thank god for tv I can see & hear perfect & my phone! Twitter has saved me from battling #ChronicLymeDisease . Every #Spoonie has shed some light for me. I’ve made great friends I’ve never met and learned so much. It’s taken so much of the isolation this disease brings away! Panicking at 3am, u can bet there’s a spoon is up to help!
